QuestData.Title: We're Surrounded
QuestData.Description: Our war has been waged for longer than your kind counts time. Let us see if you can make a difference, $r.$B$BThe stone troggs are a mistake of the titans. On your world they have succumbed to the Curse of Flesh. But here, in Deepholm, you see them in their true form.$B$BWe're surrounded. Maybe you could go out there and break a few troggs down for us. See what they're really made of?
QuestData.CompletionText: Are you going to pull your fleshy weight, $r?
QuestData.RewardText: Not a bad start, though you'll have to destroy more of them than that if you're going to rescue the Stonefather.$B$BA lot more.
